units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S9U02 — Geological processes & timescales

careers.title: Process Operator (Chemicals)
careers.whyThis: Process Operator (Chemicals) uses the Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences you’ve already been learning. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Process Operator (Chemicals) involves.
